name: Save the chick
description:
The deep and complex plot is explained through a masterfully crafted cinematic when you start the game.

The controls are simple : left click to use a power, right click to change powers (they slowly become aviable through the game) and scroll wheel to zoom in and out. But the controls are explained in game, so you didn't have to read this after all

I made it solo, and I didn't have enough time to finish it to the point I wanted to so some parts of the game are kinda rough around the edges (I did the game in about 3 days from scratch)

Oh also the settings don't work... So use the console to change the settings (sorry!)

I used some sounds from soundly (for ambient noises)
